item.title: The simplest example of scheduling on the main thread
item.description: I have recently read several articles related to relatively new react reconciliation algorithm (aka react fiber). And I wondered how to implement something really simple to explain idea of scheduling and splitting work into chunks. So here is my thoughts.

item.title: Dynamics in a static site
item.description: In this article I want to extend functionality of tooltip we've previously developed. And to figure out if it is possible to deal with something dynamic in statically build web app.
item.dc:creator: Nikita Kirsanov

item.title: Load everything lazily with IntersectionObserver
item.description: I believe it is clear for every web developer that we should care about size and amount of resources we load to a client (browser). Let's have a look at a simple technique we can use to improve initial load of web pages.
item.dc:creator: Nikita Kirsanov

item.title: Implementing medium like tooltip
item.description: Do you know that if you select post text on medium a tooltip with several options (tweet, highlight...) will appear? Have you used it? I would like to tell you how to create similar one and about DOM API I've learned during implementation.
item.dc:creator: Nikita Kirsanov
